price: 35. "Tidak ada kematian selain kematian di dunia ini. Dan kami tidak akan dibangkitkan,*(797)
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
footnotes: *797). Orang-orang musyrik Mekkah mengingkari bahwa setelah mati manusia akan dihidupkan lagi.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
